configStructure.name: simulationTime
configStructure.description: How many seconds should be simulated?

configStructure.name: bandwidth
configStructure.description: Bits/second capacity on each network link

configStructure.name: delay
configStructure.description: Seconds of latency on each network link.

configStructure.name: community1
configStructure.description: Price threshold used by community 1 for selecting generators.

configStructure.name: community2
configStructure.description: Price threshold used by community 2 for selecting generators.

configStructure.name: generator1
configStructure.description: Load threshold used by generator 1 for setting its price.

configStructure.name: generator2
configStructure.description: Load threshold used by generator 2 for setting its price.

configStructure.name: returnZip
configStructure.description: Adds the output logs to the results of the plugin.
